content:
Sure, here is the table for the roadmap of expanding the number of marketplaces and merchants for the first half of 2023:

| Strategic direction | Action items | January | February | March | April | May | June |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Identify potential marketplaces | Research and analyze potential marketplaces for expansion | ☑️ | ☑️ |  |  |  |  |
| Develop partnerships | Establish partnerships with selected marketplaces and onboard merchants |  | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |  |
| Enhance marketing efforts | Increase brand awareness and marketing activities to attract more merchants |  |  | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |
| Improve user experience | Continuously improve the user experience for both merchants and customers | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |

Hope this helps with your planning!
